title: my skin
body: riot where is my skin?im not playing league of legends almost 1 year then i open it and my skin is gone..not all but almost my skin are lock???wtf is that??? i paid for that u must do something.. here is my  account ign TOKYOPINOYSTYLE

replies.body:
Hey TokyoPinoyStyle! 

For issues with your account, you'll need to hit up [player support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They have access to accounts and can tell you what happened with your content! ^-^
